caption.center: Donald HAMPTON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Appellee.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Mason Circuit Court; John A. Breslin, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Anthony M. Wilhoit, Public Defender, Anna H. Isaacs, Asst. Public Defender, Frankfort, for appellant.
Ed W. Hancock, Atty. Gen., G. Edward James, Asst. Atty. Gen., Frankfort, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Memorandum Opinion of the Court by Justice STEPHENSON.[fn*]
[fn*] Opinion ordered not to be published.
